<title level="1" right="Rules">[Turn](/Rules.aspx?ID=3314)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
During the course of a round, each creature takes a single turn according to initiative. A creature can typically use up to three actions during its turn.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
